Name: Cantineros Gentleman Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of rose petal and gold sugar pearls.
Flambé the rosemary and place in shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Garnish with rose petal and gold sugar pearls.
History: Austrian Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by  at Custo Club in Austria.
